author: Lara Seligman
title: Acting Navy secretary offers to resign over handling of virus-stricken aircraft carrier
description: It is unclear whether Defense Secretary Mark Esper will accept the resignation.
content: Modly's offer caps an extraordinary 24 hours following the Monday morning leak of the acting Navy leader's address to the crew of the Roosevelt while the ship is tied up in Guam. Modly, who fired the ship's commanding officer Capt. Brett Crozier on Thursday, … [+2599 chars]
